Articles.Content:
Not a bug or anything, but am I going nuts here? When I first fired 1.0 up on the 27th I distinctly remember seeing a part called "Illuminator Mk3" and thinking that it's a cool part. It was a weak bi-directional spotlight apparently meant for surface illumination. Now it's gone? Was it removed for some reason? I cannot find it in the Squad/Parts folder for anything.

Feels like some 1984 ****, man.
Both illuminators are in Electrics, a 4th tier node on the lowest "path" of the new tech tree

Both illuminators are in Electrics, a 4th tier node on the lowest "path" of the new tech tree

This is in sandbox. Wasn't there a third spotlight part on launch? Seems to have gone poof.
The Illuminator Mk3 is actually a part from a mod. One of Nertea's excellent Near Future ones I believe, if its the one I'm thinking of.

The Illuminator Mk3 is actually a part from a mod. One of Nertea's excellent Near Future ones I believe, if its the one I'm thinking of.

Hmmm. I'd deleted all my mods, though.

- - - Updated - - -

Ended up being a good call. Thanks, man. Thought I was going crazy. Yes, it appears to be part of the stockalike station parts. No clue what it was doing in a clean install (or maybe I'd seen it before I deleted my mods and assumed it was stock).

Edited April 30, 2015 by Bomoo
